0.0.2.en: Small tweaks and fixes for modes.

0.0.4.en: Added new math then-cards and added signals.

0.0.5.en: Fixed a few issues with cycles.

0.0.6.en: Refactored most flow cards and introduced timer cards without functionality for now.

0.2.0.en: Update the assets and branding a bit.

1.0.1.en: Added a hint to the school holiday flow card.

1.0.2.en: Fixed a bug where a token would receive the wrong value.

1.0.3.en: Fixed a translated token error where the token would not be added at all.

1.0.6.en: Added a missing null-check in timers.

1.1.0.en: This update adds two new trigger cards: 'Flag updated' and 'Mode updated'.

1.2.0.en: This update adds a new flag on/off widget for your dashboards.

1.2.2.en: Fixed a bug where the timer remaining flow card could fire multiple times. This only was the case when multiple remaining timer cards were used with the same time, for a single timer.

1.3.0.en: This update introduces a no-repeat flow card and adds translations for all supported languages.

1.3.1.en: This update introduces a no-repeat flow card and adds translations for all supported languages.

1.4.0.en: This update introduces a new no-repeat flow card as well as a new current mode dashboard widget.

1.4.1.en: This update introduces a new no-repeat flow card as well as a new current mode dashboard widget.

1.4.2.en: This update introduces a new no-repeat flow card as well as a new current mode dashboard widget.

1.4.3.en: This update introduces a new no-repeat flow card as well as a new current mode dashboard widget.

1.5.0.en: Introduces no-repeat and clear-no-repeat flow cards, a new slider widget that can be controlled from flows via the slider-set and slider-changed cards, and a new widget that shows the current mode.

1.5.2.en: Fixed a bug where the stop timer card did not properly remove a timer from the scheduler.

1.5.3.en: This update optimizes the performance of certain flag and mode trigger execution. It also fixes a bug where the timer remaining action flow card could fire twice when a timer was paused on that exact moment.

1.5.4.en: This update removes an obsolete library that was used.

1.6.0.en: This update adds the ability to customize icons and colors for flags and modes. You may customize these from app settings.

1.6.1.en: This update adds the ability to customize icons and colors for flags and modes. You may customize these from app settings.

1.6.2.en: This update adds the ability to customize icons and colors for flags and modes. You may customize these from app settings.

1.6.3.en: This update adds the ability to customize icons and colors for flags and modes. You may customize these from app settings.

1.6.4.en: No significant changes, just some internal refactorings.

1.6.5.en: Fixed a bug where non-standard languages could not properly initialize.

1.6.9.en: No significant changes, just some internal refactorings.

1.6.12.en: This update introduces a new flow trigger for when the current mode changes.

1.6.13.en: This update adds the ability to invert the cycle has value, timer is finished, timer is paused and timer is running conditions.

1.6.14.en: This update fixes a bug where modes could not be activated or deactivated while timeline notifications were disabled.

1.7.0.en: This update introduces labels, events and corresponding widgets. It also adds support for Arabic.

1.8.2.en: This update introduces a timer widget, streamlines internal logic and adds more api endpoints.

1.8.3.en: Fixed a bug where the timer count in app settings only counted non-stopped timers.

1.9.0.en: This update introduces a filter setting for the Flags-widget, this allows you to select which flags are shown in the widget. It also fixes a bug where widgets were not updated when new flags and modes were added.
